references.paper_title: The mathematics of group relative policy optimization: A multi-agent reinforcement learning approach
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel multi-agent reinforcement learning approach for group relative policy optimization, which is relevant to the preference optimization methods discussed in the target paper.

references.paper_title: 03-mini vs deepseek-r1: Which one is safer?
references.reason: This paper compares two large language models, 03-mini and DeepSeek-R1, which are central to the experimental setup and results of the target paper.
This paper introduces the Qwen language model, which is the base model used for fine-tuning and experimentation in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Qwen-vl: A frontier large vision-language model with versatile abilities
references.reason: This paper details the Qwen-vl model, which is a multi-modal extension of the Qwen language model and could be relevant to future extensions of the research presented.

references.paper_title: RLHF deciphered: A critical analysis of reinforcement learning from human feedback for LLMs
references.reason: This paper provides a critical analysis of reinforcement learning from human feedback (RLHF), a technique closely related to the preference optimization methods employed in the target paper.
